mapper.insert: insert into cargo_order ( orderno, origin, destination, customer, tel, startdt, enddt, gw, cbm, cargotype, remark, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{orderno}, #{origin}, #{destination}, #{customer}, #{tel}, #{startdt}, #{enddt}, #{gw}, #{cbm}, #{cargotype}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update cargo_order set orderno=#{orderno}, origin=#{origin}, destination=#{destination}, customer=#{customer}, tel=#{tel}, startdt=#{startdt}, enddt=#{enddt}, gw=#{gw}, cbm=#{cbm}, cargotype=#{cargotype}, remark=#{remark}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
